description.value:
This item should be used when the Morunring Amulet is broken.  It will cause the posessor to go into a bloodlust, effectively under the effects of a non-magical Haste spell for 1 minute.

FoundryVTT: This item effectively places a no concentration haste on the token using it.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
